Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 3200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 90.7252 config.beamcenterz = 96.3425 config.drive()
